"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5465ac6f636872089f900000#post_5465ac6f636872089f900000
You need to have a great amount of adrenaline in your body to experience the bullet time, and I mean, a lot. A normal grade of adrenaline only makes the time slow only to make you think fast in dangerous situations.

That's when my partner's Stand _Superstition_ kicks in. Superstition only works when the enemy's eyes are closed. It starts to makes them hear a ringing that get progressively louder and louder until their brain can't take it anymore and just goes into shock.
